document.full_text: final preparations were underway monday evening at the baikonur space center to launch a rocket in honor of the 50th anniversary of the flight of the first person in space, yuri a. gagarin.
document.title: europe: russia: rocket launch marks 50 years of people in space
lines_and_colors: final preparations were underway monday evening at the baikonur space center to launch a rocket in honor of the 50th anniversary of the flight of the first person in space, yuri a. gagarin.
